data.Sentence_cn: 我们刚刚搬进一所新房子，我辛辛苦苦地干了整整一个上午。
data.Sentence: We have just moved into a new house and I have been working hard all morning.

data.Sentence_cn: 我试图把我的新房间收拾整齐，
data.Sentence: I have been trying to get my new room in order.

data.Sentence_cn: 但这并不容易，因为我有1,000多本书。
data.Sentence: This has not been easy because I own over a thousand books.

data.Sentence_cn: 更糟糕的是房间还非常小，所以我暂时把书放在了地板上。
data.Sentence: To make matters worse, the room is rather small, so I have temporarily put my books on the floor.

data.Sentence_cn: 这会儿，书把地板的每一点空隙都占据了，我实际上是踩着这些书进出房间的。
data.Sentence: At the moment, they cover every inch of floor space and I actually have to walk on them to get in or out of the room.

data.Sentence_cn: 几分钟前，我妹妹帮我把一个旧书橱抬上了楼。
data.Sentence: A short while ago, my sister helped me to carry one of my old bookcases up the stairs.

data.Sentence_cn: 她走进我的房间，当她看到地板上的那些书时，大吃一惊。“
data.Sentence: She went into my room and got a big surprise when she saw all those books on the floor.

data.Sentence_cn: 这是我见过的最漂亮的地毯，”她说。
data.Sentence: 'This is the prettiest carpet I have ever seen,' she said.

data.Sentence_cn: 她盯着“地毯”看了一会儿，又说：
data.Sentence: She gazed at it for some time then added,

data.Sentence_cn: “你根本用不着书橱，空闲时你可以坐在这儿读地毯！”
data.Sentence: 'You don't need bookcases at all. You can sit here in your spare time and read the carpet!'
